channel.title: Client Connecting
channel.description: Well i can make my client connect to my server. However i don't know how to make my server accept my client. (whenever i join the server kicks me) Where do i add the clients uid to? Is that what I'm meant to do?

item.title: Client Connecting
item.dc:creator: @Nschober Nschober
item.description:
@Nschober wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:3, topic:260942”][quote author=Nschober link=topic=344529.msg2661162#msg2661162 date=1234209444]
You need to get a differant client.
[/quote]

That’s not good advice. -.-

If everyone got a new server just cus of one error, the community would be fucked.

^ ^
Just an example

On topic: Not sure on this sorry.[/quote]

I said client not server…

Read full topic

item.title: Client Connecting
item.dc:creator: @moopoo82 moopoo82
item.description:
@moopoo82 wrote:

A different client wont work,
This source only accept moparscape and silab.
I cant contact the creator of the source because he left the site he owned and he only released it into the “programming” section where very few people could access it. I guess i could ask the other owner but i don’t think he would reply to me.

Read full topic
